# Terminal commands demo

This guide demonstrates the **terminal** block type. Each step provides a shell command you can **copy** to your clipboard or **execute** directly in the connected Coda terminal.
Print a welcome message to verify your terminal connection is working.
blocks.hint: Connect to the terminal first using the panel at the bottom of the sidebar.

blocks.content: List the files in the current directory with detailed information.
Display the operating system information of the connected environment.
Check your current user and the hostname of the machine.
View disk usage in a human-readable format.
You've completed the terminal demo. You can now use **terminal** blocks in your own guides to provide executable commands alongside tutorials.
